name: Tell Me A Bedtime Story
description:
Can you tell your daughter a good bedtime story without scaring yourself to death?

A quick less than 5 minute game text based horror game that is easy to play but hard to master. Figure out which combination of words to use to win, assuming RNG favors you.

Thanks for trying out the Beta! In the future I hope to add some difficulty modes, a few more mechanic ideas, and of course I'm open to feedback! 

Current known bug: Sometimes the same word will appear twice in the same choice listing, Sorry about that! It is just as intended to get the same word sometimes in a single play through, however.

If you encounter any other bugs, feel free to let me know!
